text:
Hi! I'm Daniel, math + EECS major and music minor in MIT's Class of '22.
This website catalogs personal and professional projects in all three fields, and more!

I sung with MIT Syncopasian, MIT's premiere East Asian A Cappella group.
You can find me beatboxing/singing to songs in my free time!

Other hobbies include:
Video games (Celeste, Pokemon, Minecraft, Stardew Valley...)
Card games (Hanabi, Hearts, Dou dizhu...)
Ping pong, Biking, Music, Creating, Learning...

I love doing what I do.
I hope you do too!
captions: Yes, this includes eating apples while juggling them.
